Projects.title: Our Projects
Projects.subtitle: We think different, you can see below some of our projects made with ðŸ’š.

ProjectCard.spread_software: Platform that allows you to make a video and turn it into text. Typescript, react.js and firebase were used.
ProjectCard.bentcare: Bentcare is a digital platform that has arrived to transform access to healthcare. Typescript, react.js, storybook and node.js were used.
ProjectCard.sk-company: StoreKeeper is a payment solution, webshop system, and what not more. Javascript, react.js, storybook and redux were used.
ProjectCard.ethics-net: Ethics net is a community teaching preferred behavior to machines. Javascript, react.js, node.js and mongoDB were used.
ProjectCard.my-aspire-quotes: MyAspireQuotes is a health platform that offers the bests health insurance plan. Javascript, bootstrap, and cypress were used.

AboutUsSection.description_agency: We can offer the best developers in the market. We have developers specialized in JavaScript, that use technologies like react, react-native, vue.js, node.js, next, gatsby, express, sequelize, and so on.
AboutUsSection.description_development: We are specialized to develop high-quality software. We always aim at striking long-term working relations with outstanding clients and everything is notwithstanding premised on quality that surpasses your expectations.
AboutUsSection.description_freelancing: We aim to provide a flawless freelance experience, combining excellent understanding, great communication, and speedy delivery.
AboutUsSection.title: About LeCode
AboutUsSection.description: We are a software house and a agency specialized in building modern, exceptional, high-quality websites and applications.
